verses.roman:
nograsenaḥ kila vibhur
bhoja-vṛṣṇy-andhakeśvaraḥ
śakrādayo loka-pālā
yasyādeśānuvartinaḥ

synonyms: na—not; ugrasenaḥ—King Ugrasena; kila—indeed; vibhuḥ—fit to command; bhoja-vṛṣṇi-andhaka—of the Bhojas, Vṛṣṇis and Andhakas; īśvaraḥ—the lord; śakra-ādayaḥ—Indra and other demigods; loka—of planets; pālāḥ—the rulers; yasya—of whose; ādeśa—orders; anuvartinaḥ—followers.
translation: "King Ugrasena, the lord of the Bhojas, Vṛṣṇis and Andhakas, is not fit to command, when Indra and other planetary rulers obey his orders?
